content.rendered:
Stories touch the human spirit, so what better way to teach something important than through stories? Sales Secrets provides 50 unforgettable stories that teach readers everything they want to know about sales and life. Witty, thought-provoking, effective and memorable—just what’s needed in front of prospects and customers.

If you want to put and keep your best sales foot forward, Sales Secrets is for you. Find yourself smiling as you learn to build trust and confidence with your clients.

What’s your story?
